sourceMeaningMnemonic: You are all by your lonesome <radical>self</radical> and you have to check <radical>twenty</radical> <radical>rice paddie</radical>s. The thing you have to check is the smell of all the rice paddies to see if they're ready for harvest. At each one, you open up your <kanji>nose</kanji> and smell deeply.
meaningInfo: Focus in on your nose. Your nostrils get huge, and your nose is huge. Smell the rice in your imagination. Your nose is amazing.
readingMnemonic: You get to the last of the twenty rice paddies and you open up your <kanji>nose</kanji>. Something smells like <reading><ja>花</ja></reading> (<ja>はな</ja>). Oh! The <ja>花</ja> are in bloom! How lovely.
readingInfo: Breathe the smell of the <ja>花</ja> in deeply through your nose. How convenient that they share the same reading!
